meanings.definition: A chemical group derived from an organic acid by removal of a hydroxyl group.
meanings.sent1: The acyls in the molecule determine its reactivity.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the acyls in different compounds to understand their properties.
meanings.sent3: The acyls in the solution decided to throw a party and invite all the other molecules.
meanings.sent4: The acyls acted as the leaders in the chemical reaction, guiding the other groups.
meanings.sent5: The acyls were like the conductors of the molecular orchestra, directing the performance.
